result.title: Mirror for problem statements
result.content: Next time something like this happens, it would be nice to have the problem statements available elsewhere. In this contest, an user was generous enough to provide pastes of some of the problems in TopCoder. It was helpful as I couldn't access the problems on a regular basis even at the end of the contest. Would it be possible to provide a mirror of the problem statements at the beginning (or 5 minutes after the beginning) of a contest in case the server is unresponsive or simply slow?
